definitions.definition: A new member of an organization.
One who has been through a ceremony of initiation .
One who is oriented in and familiar with a topic or subject; especially, one who is an expert in it.

main_definition: A new member of an organization.
secondary_definitions: One who has been through a ceremony of initiation .
One who is oriented in and familiar with a topic or subject; especially, one who is an expert in it.
